description:
Komoot offers the smart & easy way to experience the great outdoors. The go-to app for hikers and bikers, komoot gives you topographic maps, turn-by-turn navigation, recommendations on cool places, & much more. 

GET CUSTOM, REAL-TIME NAVIGATION
• Get Smart Tours tailored to your fitness level and sport preferences
• Hop on your bike, take a hike, or choose from other sport types, including road or mountain biking
• Use topographic maps and turn-by-turn voice navigation to guide you so you can focus on the path ahead 
• Check out Tour characteristics like surface, difficulty, distance and elevation, so you can plan down to the last detail
• Always know how fast you’re going, how far you’ve gone and how much longer you have to travel

DISCOVER & SHARE COOL OUTDOOR SIGHTS
• Check out Highlights to get recommendations on interesting places from others like you 
• Create your own Highlights to share your outdoor expertise with fellow outdoor people
• Add photos, tips, and vote on your Highlights
• Show us what you like and we’ll recommend Smart Tours over time - only from komoot! 

EXPLORE WITH NO LIMITS
• Offline Maps allows you to download your planned outdoor activities for offline usage 
• Komoot automatically syncs across devices including your smartphone, desktop and tablet 
• Follow your friends and keep up with their outdoor adventures


“Komoot does for hiking and biking what Apple does for hardware: makes it easily accessible and fun to use.”
- Cult of Mac

For support and tips, please visit help.komoot.de

Unfortunately, we cannot reply to comments in the App Store.

Please note: Allowing GPS to run in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
trackCensoredName: komoot - Cycling & Hiking Guide with Turn-by-Turn Navigation and Topographic Maps

releaseNotes:
A more stable, crash-free app experience
A new marker on the map that indicates your location in relation to a created Highlight
